column4: I cant find the following option: I want a window to be maximized, if i double click it - any hints?
furthermore, im looking for a snapping windows like in windows 7.. if i drag a window to the top, i want it maximized
i didnt get my original CS4 working until today
yes and therfore it emulates windows?!
it makes the program feel beeing windows
rsync is a command line tool - i'm talking of a gui
you don't really need a gui for that, but there are rsync guis available..
i guess the tool uses rsync
rsync is just too complicated to manage a bigger amount of backups
i use it for fairly large backups on multiple systems and don't find it complicated
is there something you prefer over it?
its not about the size of the backup, but the amount of several different backups and how to manage them
i just cant remember simple commands that i only use  times a year
